geneA.column: GENE A (Genes harbouring a genetic alteration)

geneB.column: GENE B (Genes that feature genetic dependency on Gene A)

drug.column: DRUG (In silico drug prescription for genetic dependencies)

alteration.tooltip: Type of genetic alteration. || GoF:Gain-of-Function, LoF=Loss-of-Function.

context.tooltip: Tumor type where the Gene A alteration occurs.

druggable.tooltip: Indicates whether gene A is a drug target

role.tooltip: ONC: Oncogene | TSG: Tumor Supressor Gene | HCD: High Confidence Driver | LCD: Low Confidence Driver

evidence.tooltip: Experimental platform where the Genetic Dependency (GD) was detected (RNAi or CRISPR). Green: indicates a significant association (FDR < 0.25). Grey: indicates no significance. | GD Score: magnitude of the lethality genotype-context GD as compared to the background (cell lines without the alteration). The higher the score, the more lethal is the GD.

pandrugs_score.tooltip: Score of GeneB-drug interaction according to PanDrugs DScore || Scale: 0 to 1. Higher values indicate stronger interactions.

lincs_score.tooltip: Score of GeneB-drug interaction according to the KDCP approach || Scale: 0 to 1. Higher values indicate stronger interactions.

star.tooltip: The dartboard highlights GeneB-drug interactions surpassing both PanDrugs and LINCS scores thresholds (PanDrugs>0.7 and LINCS>0.9).

validated.tooltip: Experimentally validated drug response using cell lines drug sensitivity data (IC50) from CTRP and/or GDSC.
